## Agent flow checklist (required for core work)
- [ ] Product outcome is clear and acceptance criteria are met
- [ ] Architecture/data changes are documented in the issue
- [ ] Arabic/RTL checked on `/ar` (RTL) and `/en` (LTR)
- [ ] Telemetry added/updated (PostHog events where appropriate)
- [ ] Errors are captured sensibly (Sentry breadcrumbs or logs)

## MVP spine / freeze guardrails
- [ ] No escrow/checkout introduced
- [ ] No public supplier contact leakage introduced
- [ ] If changing docs/01-model-freeze.md, an ADR exists under docs/adr/

## QA
- [ ] Typecheck passes
- [ ] Lint passes
- [ ] Critical flow smoke-tested:

  - [ ] Award creates job
